languages.text: Лорд-инквизитор Калькасар предупредил Вольного Торговца, что губернатор Вьятт пала в зловонные объятия ереси и окружила себя богохульниками и изменниками. Ее казнь и истребление ближнего круга — единственный путь, приемлемый для верного чада Императора, несмотря на то, что колония будет обезглавлена и ввергнута в хаос.

Lord Inquisitor Calcazar warned the Rogue Trader that Governor Vyatt had fallen into the fetid embrace of heresy and surrounded herself with blasphemers and traitors. Her execution and the extermination of her inner circle is the only path acceptable to a faithful child of the Emperor, despite the fact that the colony will be decapitated and plunged into chaos.
languages.original_text: Лорд-инквизитор Калькасар предупредил Вольного Торговца, что губернатор Вьятт пала в зловонные объятия ереси и окружила себя богохульниками и изменниками. Ее казнь и истребление ближнего круга — единственный путь, приемлемый для верного чада Императора, несмотря на то, что колония будет обезглавлена и ввергнута в хаос.

Her execution and the extermination of her inner circle is the only path acceptable to the faithful child of the Emperor, despite the fact that the colony will be decapitated and plunged into chaos.

Her execution and the extermination of her inner circle is the only path acceptable to a faithful child of the Emperor, despite the fact that the colony will be decapitated and plunged into chaos.

Lord Inquisitor Calcazar warned the Rogue Trader that Governor Vyatt had fallen into the fetid embrace of heresy and surrounded herself with blasphemers and traitors. Her execution and the extermination of her inner circle is the only path acceptable to a faithful child of the Emperor, despite the fact that the colony will be decapitated and plunged into chaos.

Lord Inquisitor Calcazar warned the Rogue Trader that Governor Vyatt had fallen into the fetid embrace of heresy and surrounded herself with blasphemers and traitors. Her execution and the extermination of her inner circle is the only path acceptable to a faithful child of the Emperor, despite the fact that the colony will be decapitated and plunged into chaos.

languages.text: Le seigneur inquisiteur Calcazar a prévenu {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} que la gouverneure Vyatt avait cédé aux immondes sirènes de l'hérésie et s'était entourée de traîtres et de blasphémateurs. Son exécution et l'extermination de son entourage sont la seule solution acceptable pour {mf|un|une} fidèle enfant de l'Empereur, même si la colonie sera décapitée et plongée dans le chaos.
languages.original_text: Lord Inquisitor Calcazar warned the Rogue Trader that Governor Vyatt had fallen into the fetid embrace of heresy and surrounded herself with blasphemers and traitors. Her execution and the extermination of her inner circle is the only path acceptable to a faithful child of the Emperor, despite the fact that the colony will be decapitated and plunged into chaos.

traits.locale_text: Le seigneur inquisiteur Calcazar a prévenu {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} que la gouverneure Vyatt avait cédé aux immondes sirènes de l'hérésie et s'était entourée de traîtres et de blasphémateurs. Son exécution et l'extermination de son entourage sont la seule solution acceptable pour {mf|un|une} fidèle enfant de l'Empereur, même si la colonie sera décapitée et plongée dans le chaos.

languages.text: ロード・インクィジターのカルカサルは自由開拓者に、ビャット総督が悪臭放つ異端を受け入れ、冒涜者と裏切り者に取り囲まれていると警告した。コロニーは崩壊し、混乱に陥るであろうという事実にもかかわらず、彼女の処刑と執行会の殲滅こそが、皇帝の忠実な子供として受け入れられる唯一の道である。
languages.original_text: Lord Inquisitor Calcazar warned the Rogue Trader that Governor Vyatt had fallen into the fetid embrace of heresy and surrounded herself with blasphemers and traitors. Her execution and the extermination of her inner circle is the only path acceptable to a faithful child of the Emperor, despite the fact that the colony will be decapitated and plunged into chaos.

traits.locale_text: ロード・インクィジターのカルカサルは自由開拓者に、ビャット総督が悪臭放つ異端を受け入れ、冒涜者と裏切り者に取り囲まれていると警告した。コロニーは崩壊し、混乱に陥るであろうという事実にもかかわらず、彼女の処刑と執行会の殲滅こそが、皇帝の忠実な子供として受け入れられる唯一の道である。

languages.text: 大审判官卡尔卡扎警告行商浪人，维亚特总督已经投靠邪恶异端的阵营，终日与亵渎者与叛徒为伍。若是处决维亚特及其核心圈子成员，可能会导致殖民地群龙无首、陷入混乱，但对神皇忠诚的子民而言，这是唯一可选的道路。
languages.original_text: Lord Inquisitor Calcazar warned the Rogue Trader that Governor Vyatt had fallen into the fetid embrace of heresy and surrounded herself with blasphemers and traitors. Her execution and the extermination of her inner circle is the only path acceptable to a faithful child of the Emperor, despite the fact that the colony will be decapitated and plunged into chaos.

traits.locale_text: 卡尔卡扎审判长警告行商浪人，维亚特总督已经投靠邪恶异端的阵营，终日与亵渎者与叛徒为伍。若是处决维亚特及其核心圈子成员，可能会导致殖民地群龙无首、陷入混乱，但对神皇忠诚的子民而言，这是唯一可选的道路。

languages.text: Lord Inquisidor Calcazar advirtió {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente de que la Gobernadora Vyatt había caído en la herejía y se había rodeado de blasfemos y traidores. Su ejecución y el exterminio de su círculo es el único camino aceptable para una fiel hija del Emperador, a pesar de que la colonia será decapitada y sumida en el caos.
languages.original_text: Lord Inquisitor Calcazar warned the Rogue Trader that Governor Vyatt had fallen into the fetid embrace of heresy and surrounded herself with blasphemers and traitors. Her execution and the extermination of her inner circle is the only path acceptable to a faithful child of the Emperor, despite the fact that the colony will be decapitated and plunged into chaos.

traits.locale_text: Lord Inquisidor Calcazar advirtió {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente de que la Gobernadora Vyatt había caído en la herejía y se había rodeado de blasfemos y traidores. Su ejecución y el exterminio de su círculo es el único camino aceptable para una fiel hija del Emperador, a pesar de que la colonia será decapitada y sumida en el caos.

languages.text: Großinquisitor Calcazar hat {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} gewarnt, dass Gouverneurin Vyatt in die stinkende Umarmung der Ketzerei abgeglitten ist und sich mit Blasphemisten und Verrätern umgibt. Ihre Hinrichtung und die Auslöschung ihres innersten Kreises sind der einzig Weg, der für ein treues Kind des Imperators akzeptabel ist. Trotz der Tatsache, dass die Kolonie dadurch ihre Führung verliert und ins Chaos gestürzt wird.
languages.original_text: Lord Inquisitor Calcazar warned the Rogue Trader that Governor Vyatt had fallen into the fetid embrace of heresy and surrounded herself with blasphemers and traitors. Her execution and the extermination of her inner circle is the only path acceptable to a faithful child of the Emperor, despite the fact that the colony will be decapitated and plunged into chaos.

traits.locale_text: Großinquisitor Calcazar hat {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} gewarnt, dass Gouverneurin Vyatt in die stinkende Umarmung der Ketzerei abgeglitten ist und sich mit Blasphemisten und Verrätern umgibt. Ihre Hinrichtung und die Auslöschung ihres innersten Kreises sind der einzig Weg, der für ein treues Kind des Imperators akzeptabel ist. Trotz der Tatsache, dass die Kolonie dadurch ihre Führung verliert und ins Chaos gestürzt wird.

languages.text: Lord Engizisyoncu Calcazar, Vali Vyatt'ın kâfirlik denen pisliğe teslim olduğuna ve çevresini saran günahkârlarla hainlere dair Hür Tacir'e bir uyarıda bulundu. Koloninin başsız kalıp kaosa sürüklenmesi pahasına da olsa kadının idam edilip yakın çevresinin ortadan kaldırılması, İmparator'un imanlı bir evladı için tek münasip yoldur.
languages.original_text: Lord Inquisitor Calcazar warned the Rogue Trader that Governor Vyatt had fallen into the fetid embrace of heresy and surrounded herself with blasphemers and traitors. Her execution and the extermination of her inner circle is the only path acceptable to a faithful child of the Emperor, despite the fact that the colony will be decapitated and plunged into chaos.
